name: UNNotificationCategory
desc: A type of notification that your app supports and the custom actions to display with it.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: The unique string assigned to the category.

items.name: actions
items.desc: The actions to display when a notification of this type is presented.

items.name: intentIdentifiers
items.desc: The intents related to notifications of this category.

items.name: hiddenPreviewsBodyPlaceholder
items.desc: The placeholder text to display when notification previews are disabled for the app.

items.name: categorySummaryFormat
items.desc: A format string for the summary description used when the system groups the categoryâ€™s notifications.

items.name: options
items.desc: Options for how to handle notifications of this type.
